entry.title: Portable blogging
entry.summary: I'm testing out a mobile blogging client for my Windows Mobile 5.0 Smartphone, MoBlog. It appears to work ok, including allowing me to insert an image from my phone. I'll post a longer review once I've had more time to play with it.
entry.content: I'm testing out a mobile blogging client for my Windows Mobile 5.0 Smartphone, MoBlog. It appears to work ok, including allowing me to insert an image from my phone. I'll post a longer review once I've had more time to play with it.
